import React, { useEffect, useState, useCallback } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const HeroSlider = props => { const data = props.data const [activeSlide, setActiveSlide] = useState(0); const nextSlide = () => { const index = activeSlide + 1 === data.lenght ? 0 : activeSlide + 1 setActiveSlide(index) } const prevSlide = () => { const index = activeSlide - 1 < 0 ? data.lenght - 1 : activeSlide - 1 setActiveSlide(index) } return (
{ data.map((item, index) => ( )) } { props.control ? (
{activeSlide + 1}/{data.lenght}
) : null }
) } HeroSlider.propTypes = { data: PropTypes.array.isRequired, control: PropTypes.bool } const HeroSliderItem = props => (
{props.item.title}
{props.item.description}
) export default HeroSlider
